channel.title: Make run work randomly

item.title: Make run work randomly
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:3, topic:370323”][quote author=I james I link=topic=466436.msg3411224#msg3411224 date=1290708291]

If it’s a bot, I believe it would be contained in either General Programming, or Runescape discussion.

I don’t see how this is related to servers.

HMM LETS THINK SON, HMM RS BOTS WORK FROM JAVA, SO DO PSERVERS SAME CONCEPT TWAT
[/quote]There’s no need to flame.

Just because it’s Java, doesn’t mean it deserves to be subcategorized as a server, now does it?

Now, if you would like more help, please do elaborate, and explain [with detail] what you are trying to accomplish with this bot.[/quote]
It’s easy to understand what he wants.

He’s using RSBot. At the moment, the script turns on run every time his energy is over 59%, he wants the script to turn on randomly after it gets over 59% energy. So it might turn on at 63, 92, 60, 77, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Make run work randomly
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

hi,

i want the to be able click run randomly when over certain % at the moment im using:

[code]

                if(getMyPlayer().isMoving()) {
    if (walking.getEnergy() >= 59) {
                walking.setRun(true);
            }
            }

[/code]this code is allowing run from 59% or more, i want it to be random from 59% and over.

would Misc.random work

Thanks

Read full topic
